pgTitle: List of ghost towns in British Columbia

rows.text: (BCGNIS) (location of creek mouth, may be incorrect for settlement)
Six Mile, Lower Fountains, Lower Fountain
Britannia; there were two towns, one called Mount Sheer or The Townsite on the mountain, and The Beach at sea level
1904-1959 Britannia Mining & Smelting Company; 1959-1962 Howe Sound Company; 1962-1974 Anaconda
Upper Fountains, The Fountain, Fountain Flats
Boston Bar (Name moved across the river when this community was renamed.)
